lfsom.models

Class LFSGrowingSOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • lfsom.models.LFSGrowingSOM

  • public class LFSGrowingSOM
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Growing Self-Organizing Map. It is basically a wrapper for the GrowingLayer and mainly handles command line execution and parameters. It implements the at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.models.NetworkModel interface wich is currently not used, but may be used in the future.
    Version:
    $Id: GrowingSOM.java 4015 2011-01-26 16:07:49Z mayer $
    Author:
    Michael Dittenbach

    • Method Detail

      • getCalculando

        public boolean getCalculando()
        Method for stand-alone execution of map training. Options are:
        • -h toggles HTML output
        • -l name of class implementing the labeling algorithm
        • -n number of labels to generate
        • -w name of weight vector file in case of training an already trained map
        • -m name of map description file in case of training an already trained map
        • --noDWM switch to not write the data winner mapping file
        • properties name of properties file, mandatory
        Parameters:
        args - the execution arguments as stated above.

      • train

        public void train(LFSData data,
         LFSSOMProperties props)
        Trains the map with the input data and training parameters specified in the properties provided by argument props. If the value of property tau is 1, a fix-sized layer is trained, otherwise the layer grows until a certain quality criterion determined by tau and the mean quantization error of the data (which is automatically calculated) is reached.
        Parameters:
        data - input data to train the map with.
        props - the training properties
